show.subtitle: Dr. Len and Nurse Vicki discuss various natural and holistic health topics while taking your calls.
show.title: Prescriptions For Health

title: Prescriptions For Health
content:
What does it take to be happy, healthy, and feel good? Are you really what you eat? <!--more--> What improves the quality of life and longevity and yet produces loads of free radicals?
Why is it important to manage stress naturally?
What lifestyle factor is the most predictive of all cause mortality?
How being overweight causes a chemical disaster?
Why is it critical to clean up our environment?
Why is meaningful purpose in life important for good health?
